edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.image.redaction

Class Redaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.image.redaction.Redaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation

    public class Redaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operation

    Encapsulates a redacted region of an image.

    Instances should be obtained from the RedactionService.

      • getResultingRegion

        public java.awt.Rectangle getResultingRegion(java.awt.Dimension sourceSize,
                                             Crop appliedCrop)
        Parameters:
        sourceSize - Size of the source image.
        appliedCrop - Crop that has been applied to the source image.
        Returns:
        Region of the cropped image to be redacted, or an empty rectangle if none.

      • toMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> toMap(java.awt.Dimension fullSize)
        Specified by:
        toMap in interface Operation
        Parameters:
        fullSize - Full size of the source image on which the operation is being applied.
        Returns:
        Map serialization of the operation that expresses the essence of the operation relative to the given full size. The map should include a string "operation" key pointing to the lowercase name of the operation.
